item.description: Be sure to come for a fun night and bring all of your friends.  We’ll dance the night away from 8 pm to 12 to the music of our DJ - Tasteful Productions.  There’ll be a delicious buffet from 8 to 9:30 pm for you to enjoy.  Dress to impress, and door prizes.  Dues paying Members $12, Guests $17.  For info, call Gail at 860-582-8229.  Directions to 164 Central Street:  I‑84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end, turn right, at 2nd light facility on right, park both sides of building.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you at the admission's table.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Moonglow Dance
